dialogueText: More monsters have been defeated, this time Nightmares, not Dreamless.
Did Kyo send them? What's going on?
Alice, like Dorothy, has disappeared in the wake of the attack.
You are reduced to wandering again, through the static wilderness.
Though, this time, it doesn't take you long to come upon another of Phantasia's residents.
Marie is standing, staring at nothing as you approach her. Her shoulders are slumped and she looks defeated.
She starts when you call her name.
Oh, thank goodness! I thought I was trapped here alone! I've been searching around for ages!
What is this place? How did we get here?
It's a kind of magical dream, constructed to preserve the people of Oz.
You don't really understand it all, yourself... but Dorothy created it to save her people from the Dreamless Nether.
Alice is here somewhere, too.
Ah, Dorothy... that makes sense.
In that case, I suspect I was brought here for a reason.
I don't like this place. I don't like being separated from Nutcracker...
She said she was brought here for a reason?
I suppose so, if Alice is here, too. I think maybe Dorothy wants you to meet everyone who wasn't originally from Phantasia.
Perhaps she wants you to talk to all of us for some reason?
Perhaps she does.
If that's the case, what can Marie tell you about the real world? Has she tried to return there?
I have, a number of times, but every time I was unsuccessful.
In fact, it felt to me as if it would cost my life to keep trying...
Dreamer, did you know? There's a place between Phantasia and the Dreamless Nether beyond which nothing can survive.
It is a kind of boundary... very few alive have even approached it... no one has ever come back after passing it.
Nutcracker calls it the 'Mnemosyne Boundary'. I don't know where she heard that, though. She doesn't like to talk about it.
The Mnemosyne Boundary... that sounds somewhat sinister.
I think that boundary extends all around Phantasia, in every compass direction... as well as above and below us.
But I think there are places where it doesn't separate us from the Dreamless Nether, but from... somewhere else.
Another world?
Perhaps... Maybe many other worlds... I don't know.
All I know is, when I felt closest to death after attempting to return home... I heard music.
Music?
Yes, though more like a child's music box. It reminded me of my childhood toys back home, but it was a melody I'd never heard before, so it couldn't have been mine.
I'm sorry, I don't know what it means, but perhaps this is what Dorothy wants me to tell you?
You try to puzzle it out, but as you do, shadows start to swim around you and the sound of distant screaming starts up.
Instantly, you're on your guard.
Dreamer?! What is it?
You have an idea.
There is a low rumble and for a lingering instant the ground shakes beneath your feet.
A breeze suddenly blows, rustling the leaves on the formerly static trees, before dying away to nothing once again.
There is definitely something affecting Dorothy's dream world.
Dreamer! Something's coming...
The shadows spread across the idyllic landscape...
And sure enough, in the next moment, more Nightmares spring to attack!
As they do, though, a commanding voice forestalls them.
Not this time, monster!
Dreamer, it's time to eject these creatures from my world, once and for all!
With you and the three of us, we should have enough power!
Alice! Dorothy!
Right! You summon your heroes and prepare to fight, one more time!
금방 돌아올게, 잠깐만 기다려?
앨리스는 그 한마디만 남겨놓고 문 안으로 훌쩍 건너가버렸다.
큰 전투를 앞둔 사람의 모습이라고는 상상할 수 없을 정도로 발랄한 태도가 앨리스답다.
그때, 앨리스가 갑자기 내 머리 위로 뚝 떨어졌던 것처럼 발 아래 거대한 문이 생겨났다.
문 아래쪽에도 숲이 이어져 있긴 하지만... 여긴 대체 어떤 구조로 되어있는거지?
... 세상에, 꿈꾸는 자?
수풀 사이에 긴장한 얼굴로 숨어있던 마리가 불쑥 몸을 일으켰다.
금방이라도 울음을 터트릴 것처럼 눈이 그렁그렁하다.
우와앗, 정말 꿈꾸는 자 맞아요? 여긴 어디에요? 아니, 방금 분명 위에서 떨어졌죠!?
아! 우선 제 뒤로 오세요. 그렇게 위험한 종류는 아닌 것 같지만 숲속에 드림리스가 있는 것 같아요!
그러고보니 마리도 판타지아 출신이 아니라고 했었지.
도로시, 앨리스, 마리... 이 세 사람의 공통점은 그것 뿐이다. 도로시의 꿈이 나머지 두 사람에게도 연결되어 있는 것은 아닐까?
내가 알고 있는 것을 마리에게 간단하게 설명했다.
음, 그러니까 여긴 도로시라는 분이 만든 세계고...
드림리스 네더에게 당한 오즈의 주민 분들도 눈에 보이지는 않지만 이 세계에 존재하고...
균열에서 바로 나타나는 드림리스와 악몽들은 상대적으로 더 강하다, 이런 이야기죠?
마리가 내 손을 붙잡고 씩씩하게 미소 지었다.
그나저나 도미니언이 된 앨리스 씨도 굉장하지만, 도미니언을 불러올 수 있는 도로시 씨도 굉장하네요.
뭐, 사정은 이해했어요! 어떻게든 되지 않으려나~ 우울하면 우선 춤이라도 추고 있을까요?
혹시 마리도 판타지아의 경계에 가본 적이 있을까?
춤을 추듯 내 손을 당기던 마리가 움직임을 멈추고 고개를 기울인다.
판타지아의 경계라면, 므네모시네 구역을 말씀하시는 거죠?
아. 판타지아의 끝과 세계 밖의 접경지대를 므네모시네 구역이라고 불러요.
지금은 드림리스 네더가 그 구역을 장악하면서 이름 대신 공허나 심연으로 부르고 있지만...
밖에서 판타지아 안으로 들어온 사람들은 모두 그 므네모시네 구역을 거쳐서 왔어요.
저도 앨리스 씨나 도로시 씨와 비슷해요. 드림리스 네더가 나타난 후로 판타지아에서 빠져나갈 수 없게 되었거든요.
앨리스는 거기에서 목소리를 들었다고 했는데...
어머, 정말요?
전 므네모시네 구역에 들어갔을 때 정말 죽을 뻔 해서, 뭔가 들은 기억은...
한참 고민하던 마리가 갑자기 크게 손뼉을 쳤다.
맞아요! 그때 어떤 음악 소리를 들었어요. 음악? 악기?
오르골과 비슷했던 것 같아요. 아주 희미한 소리였기 때문에 전부 다 기억나는 건 아니지만...
마리가 처음 보는 표정으로 나를 바라본다. 두려움, 슬픔, 분노... 고통이 묻어나는 얼굴.
지금 생각해보면 제가 목소리를 음악소리로 잘못 들었을 수도 있고요.
정말, 정신이 하나도 없었거든요. 정말 제 몸이 녹아내리고 있었으니까.
언젠가 앨리스가 했던 말과 비슷한 이야기다.
메르헨, 심지어 도미니언급 강자의 몸을 녹여 세계와 세계 사이의 경계에 가둬둘 수 있는 존재.
이런... 드림리스인가봐요. 이쪽으로 오세요, 꿈꾸는 자!
순간 땅이 크게 흔들렸다.
나무 몇 개가 굉음을 내며 쓰러지고, 그림자 속에 자그마한 균열이 나타났다.
앨리스 때와 마찬가지다. 균열에서부터 튀어나온 손이 무언가를 찾듯 바닥을 더듬는다.
알 수 없는 무언가가 도로시가 만든 세계에 간섭하려 한다.
이건, 므네모시네의...? 설마, 그럴리가!
팔이 스친 자리의 초목이 순식간에 검게 녹아내린다.
닿으면 죽는다, 보는 순간 확신할 수 있었다.
틈을 비집고 튀어나온 드림리스와 악몽들이 충혈된 눈으로 우리를 바라본다.
아핫, 아하핫! 좋아, 재미있네. 방해꾼이 많으면 많을수록 사랑은 더 절실해지는 법이지! 전부 죽여줄게!
정말~ 도미니언 친구~ 적당히 해주면 안 될까요...?
어라라~? 꿈꾸는 자! 이런 곳에 있었군요~? 한가하시다면 좀 도와주실래요? 한가하지 않아도 도와주세요~
언제 이쪽으로 건너온건지 피크닉 바구니를 든 도로시가 여유롭게 손을 흔들었다.
그 불길한 손을 아무렇지 않게 붙잡아 당기며, 앨리스는 나를 향해 환하게 미소짓고 있다.
More monsters have been defeated, this time Nightmares, not Dreamless.
Did Kyo send them? What's going on?
Alice, like Dorothy, has disappeared in the wake of the attack.
You are reduced to wandering again, through the static wilderness.
Though, this time, it doesn't take you long to come upon another of Phantasia's residents.
Marie is standing, staring at nothing as you approach her. Her shoulders are slumped and she looks defeated.
She starts when you call her name.

It's a kind of magical dream, constructed to preserve the people of Oz.
You don't really understand it all, yourself... but Dorothy created it to save her people from the Dreamless Nether.
Alice is here somewhere, too.
Ah, Dorothy... that makes sense.
In that case, I suspect I was brought here for a reason.
I don't like this place. I don't like being separated from Nutcracker...

I suppose so, if Alice is here, too. I think maybe Dorothy wants you to meet everyone who wasn't originally from Phantasia.
Perhaps she wants you to talk to all of us for some reason?
Perhaps she does.
If that's the case, what can Marie tell you about the real world? Has she tried to return there?
I have, a number of times, but every time I was unsuccessful.
In fact, it felt to me as if it would cost my life to keep trying...

It is a kind of boundary... very few alive have even approached it... no one has ever come back after passing it.
Nutcracker calls it the 'Mnemosyne Boundary'. I don't know where she heard that, though. She doesn't like to talk about it.

But I think there are places where it doesn't separate us from the Dreamless Nether, but from... somewhere else.

Perhaps... Maybe many other worlds... I don't know.
All I know is, when I felt closest to death after attempting to return home... I heard music.

Yes, though more like a child's music box. It reminded me of my childhood toys back home, but it was a melody I'd never heard before, so it couldn't have been mine.
I'm sorry, I don't know what it means, but perhaps this is what Dorothy wants me to tell you?
You try to puzzle it out, but as you do, shadows start to swim around you and the sound of distant screaming starts up.
Instantly, you're on your guard.
Dreamer?! What is it?
You have an idea.
There is a low rumble and for a lingering instant the ground shakes beneath your feet.
A breeze suddenly blows, rustling the leaves on the formerly static trees, before dying away to nothing once again.
There is definitely something affecting Dorothy's dream world.
Dreamer! Something's coming...
The shadows spread across the idyllic landscape...
And sure enough, in the next moment, more Nightmares spring to attack!
As they do, though, a commanding voice forestalls them.
Not this time, monster!
Dreamer, it's time to eject these creatures from my world, once and for all!
With you and the three of us, we should have enough power!
Alice! Dorothy!
Right! You summon your heroes and prepare to fight, one more time!
